summary: Craftable and temperable Succubus outfit, female only, CBBE texture set, HDT High Heel shoes, BBP weighted.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Night Temptress
Author: Edhildil
08,12,2014
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]



[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]NSFW. Adult Content. Skimpy. Evil theme. Nudity. Boobs, Blah, blah, blah...etc.[/b][/size][/color]

Craftable and temperable Succubus outfit, female only, CBBE texture set, HDT High Heel shoes, BBP weighted.

Crafting is in the Leather catagory, to temper you'll need the Arcane Smithing perk.

There are three different suits available Regular, Transparent Lace, and Latex.

I made this outfit from a custom body shape and I do not expect to make this for any other body type as I have not the time. The weight size is fixed to the custom body. I may make sevenbase at a later time.

This is not something that is easily converted to another body type.
The way I made it is .007 scale larger than the body itself so weight sliders and bodyslide aren't going to happen from me.
To make a conversion would mean to remake it from whatever other body and I am not going to do that either, I just don't have the time, once again.
 
This is skimpy so expect a lot of skin. It's based off the Succubus concept so please keep that in mind also.

The world model for the armor pieces looks like a book, and acts like one. That means if you drop one of the items it will look like a book and it will look like a book in your inventory. Why? Because it is funny.

This would be a good outfit for a red or pale skinned demonic follower, or as an outfit for enemies in a Hell based mod.
See Usage below for details if you want to add this to your mod.

[color=#a61c00][size=4]mods in screenshots include:[/size][/color]

Hair: Apachii SkyHair female pack
Skin: Sporty Sexy Sweat, SG Textures Renewal CBBE
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty


[youtube]GCWBxc1Tat4[/youtube]


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)

BBP Skeletons and animations [color=#e69138]( You CTD without the skeleton!)[/color]

HDT High Heel System

 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.


[color=#ffd966][size=4]Uninstallation:[/size][/color]

delete the folders and files included in this mod:

data_meshes_armor_edhildil_nighttempt
data_textures_armor_edhildil_nighttemptress
EdhildilsNightTemptress .esp

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Edhildil for Night Temptress
Caliente for CBBE
Apachii and DonMichael71, and Edhildil for the heels

Thank you Vatiwah for the vid!

[color=#f1c232][size=4]Tools used:
=======[/size][/color]
Blender
Nifscope
FRAPS
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my work in your mod credit me (Edhildil) so feel free to use my assets. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
